name: [LLM Economics] Pricing map may have drifted from official rates
query: service:llm-incident-commander AND ("Pricing map has been modified" OR "pricing.drift_detected")
message:
## ⚠️ PRICING DRIFT ALERT

**Alert Trigger:**
Pricing map validation detected divergence from official rates

**Action Required:**
1. Check Google Cloud official pricing: https://cloud.google.com/vertex-ai/pricing
2. Compare with GEMINI_PRICING_MAP in app/config.py
3. If rates changed: Update pricing map and increment verified_date

@cost-management-team @compliance
